GameEntities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEntities.Packman
      • GameEntities.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GIS_element

    public class Player
extends Packman
    This Class represent the main player of the game and extends the Packman class. The main player is identical in all his characteristics to the other packmans except his ability to calculate azimuth from its current point to the next (which will be sent to the server). When the game is loaded the user is asked to place the main player according to the winning strategy considerations.
    Author:
    Inna and Chen
